title: Highland indians of Peru
brief_description: Discusses the plight of the Peruvian Indian and shows the slum life in the city and the primitive life in the highlands. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
description: Discusses the plight of the Peruvian Indian and shows the slum life in the city and the primitive life in the highlands. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
